item.title: 33 Women Doing Amazing Things in Graphic Design
item.description:
33 Women Doing Amazing Things in Graphic Design

These talented women have unleashed their creativity and skills on the world of graphic design. Paula Scher is an American graphic designer, illustrator, and educator, and the first female Principal at . She started experimenting with typography in the early 1980s and looked to historic design sources such as Russian Constructivism, obscure and little-used typefaces, and her seemingly unlimited imagination.

item.title: Updating LA's Historic Hollywood Roosevelt Hotel
item.description:
Updating LA's Historic Hollywood Roosevelt Hotel

On the roster of storied LA hotels, The Hollywood Roosevelt ranks high on the list, with its blend of Old Hollywood lore and allure. From The Tower to The Cabanas beside their David Hockney-painted pool, the entire property has played host to private parties and even more private conversations that would ultimately impact the surrounding city.

item.title: Colorado's Woody Creek Distillers
item.description:
Colorado's Woody Creek Distillers

Only last week a panel of expert judges convened for the annual San Francisco World Spirits Competition-arguably the most prestigious and analytical booze assembling in the States. While the complete results won't be formally announced until 4 April, it's already known that Colorado's independently owned Woody Creek Distillers (located just a 20-minute drive from downtown Aspen) won double gold for one of their newer releases: a tasty small-batch Colorado Straight Rye.

item.title: What it's like to ride in the Tesla Model 3
item.description:
What it's like to ride in the Tesla Model 3

HAWTHORNE, California - I've had a terrible flu all week. My body aches, my head is pounding, and my throat feels like it might fall out of my neck. Right now, though, I'm riding in the Tesla Model 3, one of the most hotly anticipated cars in the world...

item.title: Best of CH 2015: Instagram
item.description:
Best of CH 2015: Instagram

Four and a half years ago we joined Instagram and have posted over 2,500 images since. More than 99% of the photographs we share, we ourselves have taken, and that's something we're quite proud of.
